metadata.title: CVE-2023-45229 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: EDK2's Network Package is susceptible to an out-of-bounds read vulnerability when processing the IA_NA or IA_TA option in a DHCPv6Advertise message. This vulnerability can be exploited by an attacker to gain unauthorizedaccess and potentially lead to a loss of Confidentiality.

criterions.comment: edk2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
